title: I am looking for someone to play kayle support with heal and exhaust for a team.(silver-gold)
body:
I am looking for someone to play kayle support with heal and exhaust and to follow the video guide prepared as well as all commands given in game in order to climb the ladder in flex (silver-gold).

This may become a paid position (with real money)  in the future and if you start earlier rather than later you will have an advantage when it comes time for me to choose the lineup.

ign: transcender

replies.body: This thread is a bit controversial and is causing some persistent problems, so I'm gonna go ahead and lock it. If anyone is interested just add the guy in game.

Even if they followed your advice like a robot, you would still lose the majority of your games because that strat is just set to fail. Why not post the  video guide of your test runs from a while back on this board? They would see how retarded the strategy is. The reality of the situation is that you think you understand the game at a higher level, but you don't. You have a cheese strategy that isn't even very good.

In general, nobody likes to just 'follow orders'. They want to have input and be creative inside the game framework. Maybe if you paid someone for their time, then you could be the boss.
Sorry Kayle Support? I really don't think you're gonna find someone that does that.
They don't need experience in playing it, they just need to be willing to try something new and try to master it.
Paid position üòÇ. Just get good and carry yourself m8
‚ÄúLooking for professional troll, will pay you to troll‚Äù is this what you meant?
People "troll" without getting paid. Just because you don't understand the game in the slightest, doesn't mean that everything you disagree with is trolling.
So you saying no one knows the game except you.... cus I‚Äôm no seeing any Kayle support with heal exhaust
Never said I knew the game, that is why people try it out, to see if it works/they like it.
Well no one likes it and it doesn‚Äôt work boi

Lol, dude. What make you think you understand the game so well? Your theorycraft is at a very low level. I wonder if you have ever watch Pro play, or vlog of  professional coaches of big team doing analysis. You sound like a dude that dont take critic well and would go on defend mode and be stubborn till the bitter end. Also can you afford to pay them? you dont sound like a dude any 1 want to hire.
nah he's probably a yi main or something trying to do the Chinese boosting strat.
